message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for my product.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
